description:
The complete content is developed in High Quality 3D Animations, that will help you to understand the critical concepts which cannot be able to watch in the real world such as MAGNETIC FIELD LINES, EARTH MAGNETISM, MAGNETIC WAVES, ETC.

*The course is directed to the point and restricted to the syllabus nothing less and nothing more, so you will not waste your time, with invaluable speech,

·* If you know exactly your syllabus you will appreciate these videos,

·* The average video duration is 3 mins so you will not get bored with the course and you can find reasonable points to pause and complete later,

This course covers

  1. Nutrition
  2. Hygiene
  3. Health organizations
  4. Heterotrophic nutrition
  5. Deficiency disease - malnutrition
  6. Vitamins - source and deficiency
  7. Process of disease
  8. Protozoan disease
  9. Fungal diseases
  10. Jaundice
  11. Aids
  12. First aid
  13. Health agencies - hospitals
title: Nutrition and some common diseases
